source_text: 配电室门净宽度不应小于1.2m
source_text_en: The clear width of distribution room door shall not be less than 1.2m
The pressure resistance of control room should be 2.0kPa

source_text: 开关室耐火极限应满足1.0h
source_text_en: The fire resistance rating of switchgear room shall meet 1.0h
The evacuation distance of pump room shall not be less than 20m
The clear height of fire pump room shall be 2.4m

source_text: 配电间疏散距离不得大于15m
source_text_en: The evacuation distance of distribution room shall not exceed 15m

source_text: 高压室净宽度不得大于1.0m
source_text_en: The clear width of high-voltage room shall not exceed 1.0m

source_text: 柴油发电机房净高不得大于3.3m
source_text_en: The clear height of diesel generator room shall not exceed 3.3m

source_text: 配电间净空高度不大于2.8m
source_text_en: The clear height of distribution room shall not exceed 2.8m
The pressure resistance of UPS room shall meet 3.0kPa
